pizzas.name: Margherita Pizza
pizzas.description: roundish in shape with a raised edge (the cornicione) and garnished with hand-crushed peeled tomatoes, mozzarella (buffalo mozzarella or fior di latte), fresh basil leaves, and extra virgin olive oil.

pizzas.name: Marinara Pizza
pizzas.description: seasoned with only tomato sauce, extra virgin olive oil, oregano and garlic.

pizzas.name: Capricciosa Pizza
pizzas.description: prepared with mozzarella cheese, Italian baked ham, mushroom, artichoke and tomato.

pizzas.name: Pizza quattro formaggi
pizzas.description: It is topped with a combination of four kinds of cheese, usually melted together, with (rossa, red) or without (bianca, white) tomato sauce.

pizzas.name: Pizza quattro stagioni
pizzas.description: is prepared in four sections with diverse ingredients, with each section representing one season of the year.

pizzas.name: Pizza pugliese
pizzas.description: It is prepared with tomato, onion, and mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Seafood pizza
pizzas.description: Fresh or frozen seafood may be used,[5] and some versions use canned seafood, such as canned tuna.

pizzas.name: White pizza
pizzas.description: made with tomato, garlic, oregano and extra-virgin olive oil

pizzas.name: Colorado-style pizza
pizzas.description: thick, braided crust topped with heavy amounts of sauce and cheese.
